content:
{{knowledge objective
|Identifiant=OIC-265-06-A
|Item_parent=Urinary lithiasis
|Item_parent_short=Urinary lithiasis
|Rank=A
|Title=Knowing the factors contributing to renal colic
|Description=Travel, heat, dehydration, physical activity, dietary changes
|Rubric=Positive diagnosis
|Contributors=Romain Boissier
|Order=6}}

Factors favouring nephritic colic are all factors that encourage the migration of a kidney stone into the ureter: travel, heat, dehydration, physical activity, dietary changes.

question.title: What factors favour the migration of a kidney stone into the ureter?

option_a.title: Travel and physical activity
option_a.description: Factors that favour the migration of a kidney stone into the ureter

option_b.title: Dehydration and dietary changes
option_b.description: Factors that favour the migration of a kidney stone into the ureter

option_c.title: Heat and physical activity
option_c.description: Factors that favour the migration of a kidney stone into the ureter

option_d.title: Travel and dietary changes
option_d.description: Factors that favour the migration of a kidney stone into the ureter

correct_option.title: A
correct_option.description: The letter of the correct option
